thread.title: Amy Jackson to shoot for Gethu in Goa | Deccan Chronicle
thread.title_full: Amy Jackson to shoot for Gethu in Goa | Deccan Chronicle

author: Deccan
title: Amy Jackson to shoot for Gethu in Goa | Deccan Chronicle
text: Deccan Chronicle | September 16, 2015, 03.00 am Amy Jackson Amy Jackson who has been busy with the promotions of B’town flick Singh is Bling has joined the crew of Gethu after a short hiatus in Goa. The actress was a part of the shooting which took place in Kodaikkanal and Kerala some time back, and is paired opposite Udhayanidhi in the film. The actress tweeted, “Very happyyyy to be shooting with @Udhaystalin and the #Gethu team again. Missed you guys.” Sathyaraj, Karunakaran, Vikranth, among others play pivotal roles in Gethu, which has Thirukumaran at the helm. Harris Jayaraj has been roped in as the music composer for the film, and is teaming up with Udhayanidhi for the fourth time. Meanwhile, Amy also has two films in Tamil — one each opposite Vijay and Dhanush. entertainment Kollywood Gethu Amy Jackson Also Read Fantastic Four star is a real-life hero Merry Christmas to all: Actress Anisha Ambrose Anil Kapoor's look in ‘Dil Dhadakne Do’ revealed Tom Hardy wears Elton John’s old clothes for the biopic
